titleStmt.title: An abridgment of the architecture of Vitruvius containing a system of the whole works of that author : illustrated with divers copper plates, curiously engraved : with a table of explanation : to which is added in this edition the etymology and derivation of the terms used in architecture / first done in French by Monsr Perrault, of the Academy of Paris, and now Englished, with additions.
titleStmt.author: Vitruvius Pollio.

titleStmt.title: An abridgment of the architecture of Vitruvius containing a system of the whole works of that author : illustrated with divers copper plates, curiously engraved : with a table of explanation : to which is added in this edition the etymology and derivation of the terms used in architecture / first done in French by Monsr Perrault, of the Academy of Paris, and now Englished, with additions.
titleStmt.author: Vitruvius Pollio.
Perrault, Claude, 1613-1688. Dix livres d'architecture de Vitruve.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Abel Swall and T. Child ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
"A table of the chapters" (i.e. summary of the chapters): p. [3]-[10]
Attributed to Vitruvius Pollio. cf. NUC pre-1956.
